title: This indenture: according to the method, and by the order and direction of his Majestie and most honourable Privy Councel, printed and published in the thirty fourth year of his Majesties reign of England &c. that now is (1682.) that all servants at any time as are free and willing to be retained to serve in His Majesties plantations in America, are to be duely examined by any of His Majesties.[sic] Justices of the Peace, ...
